enhanced_by.reason: The build method relies on the deferredValues list, which is populated by the addAll method.
The build method processes the whenSet consumers, which are added by the whenSet method.
Both build and buildIsChanged methods return DeferredChanged objects, making assertions about the output of buildIsChanged useful for testing build.
Both build and DeferredLogger.logValue involve logging operations, which can be used to verify the state of the deferred values during testing.
